value:
$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|Wait a minute! Hilda? Marianne?
What are you doing here?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|I was about to say the same thing!
Weren't you going swimming?$k$p$nMPID_マリアンヌ|We...we thought we'd get treats for
everyone... Since we thought...$k$p$WmMPID_水着メルセデス,ch17_17_Mercedes_F_Swim21,Face|Ooh. We bought some frozen treats
as well!$k$p$WmMPID_水着カスパル,ch17_09_Casper_M_Swim21,Face|Yeah, yeah! Here they are!
...Hurry up and take them.
My hands are freezing!$k$p$WmMPID_水着アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_Swim21,Face|Seems like you both had the
same idea!$k$pNow...shall we take advantage of this
moment and cool down in the shade?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_比翼ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|Hm... Where did the boys get off to?$k$p$WmMPID_水着メルセデス,ch17_17_Mercedes_F_Swim21,Face|They said they were off to dry the
fish they caught. They must be down
on the rocks if that's the case.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|Huh... We finally have vacation, and
they're spending time practicing
survival skills...$k$pMaybe the Professor will be pleased.$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|Hey, uh...Hilda? Sorry about earlier.
I shouldn't have made fun of how
you like to enjoy your time off.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|*sigh* I should apologize too...
I definitely could have been a bit
nicer myself.$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|But you were right! People should
be free to enjoy themselves however
they want!$k$pJust because I enjoy something
doesn't mean others have to enjoy
it too—or enjoy it the same way!$k$pI shouldn't force my opinions on
other people...$k$p$WmMPID_水着メルセデス,ch17_17_Mercedes_F_Swim21,Face|Come now. That's enough, you two.
You've done well admitting your own
faults and reflecting on them.$k$pI am sure the goddess will find
it in her heart to forgive you.$k$p$WmMPID_マリアンヌ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|It is not easy to admit that we think
and live differently than others...$k$pAnd when people I hold dear disagree
with one another...it makes for a
stressful situation...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ヒルダ|Hm? Wait... Does that mean...I'm
someone you hold dear, Marianne?$k$p$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Huh?! I— W-well, yes! Were you not
aware? I mean, we are all classmates
at the Officers Academy together...$k$pSo, that makes us friends...right?$k$p$WmMPID_水着メルセデス,ch17_17_Mercedes_F_Swim21,Face|Hee hee! That's exactly right! That's
why we ought to all enjoy our own
sorts of fun.$k$pAnd we can all be happy knowing our
friends are enjoying themselves in a
way that suits them.$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|Yes! Even if we aren't all in the same
house, we're all still friends from the
same academy!$k$pSo...I'll do my best not to upset
you, Marianne! You can count on me.$k$p$WmMPID_マリアンヌ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|Oh, that's sweet of you to say...$k$p$nMPID_比翼ヒルダ|Speaking of sweet, this frozen treat
really filled me up!$k$pMaybe I should go for a swim to help
digest it...$k$p$WmMPID_水着レオニー,ch17_26_Leonie_F_Swim21,Face|Oh! Feeling up for it now, are you?
Well then, come on! Race me to
those rocks!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_FF_Pair,Face|Wh-what?! That's so far away!
Besides, I didn't really mean
I wanted to race, I just wanted—$k$pH-hey! Leonie! ...Wait for me!$k$pHow are you so fast?!$k$p$nMPID_マリアンヌ|Hee hee hee... *sigh*$k$p$Sbs150|
